quote: Christmas makes me schmaltzy. I'm proud to be level-headed, even a little tough most of the time. But once a year I like to believe that peace on earth may be possible and calories don't count.
quote_letters: CHRISTMAS MAKES ME SCHMALTZY IM PROUD TO BE LEVEL-HEADED EVEN A LITTLE TOUGH MOST OF THE TIME BUT ONCE A YEAR I LIKE TO BELIEVE THAT PEACE ON EARTH MAY BE POSSIBLE AND CALORIES DONT COUNT
